Importing libraries:
```{r}
library(countrycode)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```
Load Files:
```{r}
completecsv <- read_csv("HDR21-22_Composite_indices_complete_time_series.csv",
                        na = "NA")
countries <- read_csv("World_Countries_(Generalized).csv")
```
csv manipulation:
```{r}
gii <- completecsv %>% 
  dplyr::select(contains("country"), 
         contains("gii_2010"),
         contains("gii_2019"))%>%
   na.omit()%>%
   mutate(difference_gii = (gii_2019-gii_2010))


```
Join tables:
```{r}
joined_gii <- gii%>%
  clean_names()%>%
  left_join(.,
            countries,
            by = c("country"="COUNTRY"))
```
